channel.title: Image on Tech Adventures by Tarun Lalwani
channel.description: Recent content in Image on Tech Adventures by Tarun Lalwani

item.title: Selenium disable Image loading in different browsers
item.description: Sometimes during testing or scraping a website, we are not interested in loading the images on the page. Disabling images helps up speed up the page load times and make execution faster. Even if we are interested in knowing the location (source) of images, we can still disable loading of all the images in GUI. In Selenium each browser requires different techniques to do so. We will look at each one of them one by one
